title: Leeward Apts...New York Style..Gorgeous Newly Remodeled Studio!
posting_body: This is the most perfect New York style studio apartment that you will find in the Mid-Wilshire or Koreatown area.
Great care and love was taken to restore and remodel this beautiful building.
Amenities: Completely remodeled, charming exposed brick, hardwood or manufactured floors throughout unit, tile bathrooms, granite kitchen counters!!
All new lighting and plumbing fixtures.
Ceiling fan. heater.
Custom paint colors that bring out the details, and give the unit a warm, soft feel.
Fully Renovated, New kitchen counters.
Laundry Onsite.
Prime location.
Gets plenty of natural light.
Controlled access entry with closed circuit cameras throughout building.
Close to shops, restaurants, park and schools.
Close to public transportation (MTA, 110 Freeway).
MUST SEE TO APPRECIATE!
The building is Art Deco Style.
The units are New York Style.
Cats and dogs allowed with an additional deposit.
Don't miss out on this great deal.
Pictures in this ad are a representation and may not reflect the actual apartment that is currently available.
Professionally Managed by Statewide Enterprises, Inc.
For more information: <URL>
To view a virtual tour of unit 207 - studio - <URL>
-Quoted security deposit is on approved credit.
-6 or 12 month lease - Six month lease available with $100 monthly surcharge.
The rent, deposit, and terms listed in this ad are only valid for the actual date that this ad was initially posted.
